item.title: Athira add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Athira add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Athira add a quote by Sharon Creech
item.description: "Then I thought, boy, isn't that just typical? You wait and wait and wait for something, and then when it happens, you feel sad." -- Sharon Creech

item.title: Athira add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "People aren't either wicked or noble. They're like chef's salads, with good things and bad things chopped and mixed together in a vinaigrette of confusion and conflict." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Athira add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "No matter who you are, no matter where you live, and no matter how many people are chasing you, what you don't read is often as important as what you do read." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Athira add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Athira add a quote by Masashi Kishimoto
item.description: "There is only one will and that is the Will of Fire. The will that doesn't let you give up" -- Masashi Kishimoto

item.title: Athira add a quote by Tite Kubo
